Enshrouded Config Editor

Use this tool to create and/or validate your configuration file for your Enshrouded dedicated server.

Bring your own

  • Paste your enshrouded_server.json file into the editor.
  • Look for the colorful squiggly underlines that indicate warnings or errors.
  • Press F8 to navigate through problems.

Start fresh

  1. The editor on this page contains the current default configuration.
  2. Hover over any setting to see a description.
  3. Press F1 for the full editor command palette.

Security & privacy

  • All editing and validation happens in your browser.
  • Config files are never saved or sent to a server.
  • No ads, tracking, or similar nonsense.

Open source

This tool is open source software. You can find it on GitHub.
